name: Blocky Falls
description:
Hey! Blocky Falls is a arcade game, where you need to get of the cubes. The more you destroy, the more percentages you get! I hope you enjoy it, at the beginning this game had to be multiplayer, something like a TNT RUN in Minecraft. I wanted to   recreate my memories, where I and my friends had a lot of fun, but it had no players :( 

So there are 26 levels to beat! :D 

Hope you enjoy it! <3
